name: ArtBrowser
slogan: ArtBrowser is a social discovery platform for art lovers
description:
Art is a pleasure. 

A pleasure that should be "open to all".

No pretension, no patronisation, no barriers. Part of your world not a special world.

At home, on the train, at work, in the street not just behind museum and gallery walls.

Something that talks to you, to your mood, to the moment. Something that feeds your soul.

Which is why we are more than just another place to buy art. We are a place for you to browse the universe of art.

Create your profile with art you love. Share it. Talk about it with fellow art lovers. Find what they love.

Connect with the artists and galleries you are interested in.

Follow the latest exhibitions, hot topics, talented artists and inspiring pieces from collectors.

Receive suggestions from people like you - the real experts.

And if you do want to buy as a result, we offer a 0% commission model for artists, galleries and buyers...so another barrier removed!

There is a universe of art waiting to be discovered. Browse with us.

team.name: Shilpa Karkeraa
team.bioHtml: Researcher with hands-on experiences in 9 diverse industries specialised in Automation, Large Scale Digital Transformation & Impact driven Applications.

team.name: Rohit Shetty
team.bioHtml: Co-founder & CEO @ArtBrowser • Worked at @PwC, @Deutsche Bank

jobs.title: Director of Marketing, User Retention & Growth
jobs.description:
Website: www.artbrowserapp.com

ArtBrowser is a holistic discovery platform for art lovers to discover and browse all things art. In essence, we believe that by creating a space of easy association for all people and things that make up the world of art, more purchases of artworks will take place and the world will become all the more beautiful for it.

We aim to remove the hardship for the millions of art buyers that just don’t have the time or don’t know what to look for as well as the countless talented artists and aspiring galleries that want to find new buyers and engage with a global audience at the click of a button. We provide an up-to-date destination for the latest events and art news happening everywhere. We do all this with zero sales commission charged to either the artist, gallery or the buyer.

We know the art universe can be overwhelming so ArtBrowser is a curated haven dedicated to finding the gallery or artist perfect to the art lover’s taste. We are lead generator and fun browsing experience with an ever strict eye on the quality of art added to our site. Also, we have an algorithm-loving Art-Bot working in the background to understand exactly what type of art turns a buyer on.

With a UX focused website designed by artists and unique features integrating Artificial Intelligence and Augmented Reality in the near future, ArtBrowser is set to take the art world by storm.

Candidate Profile:

With the website due to launch soon we are looking for candidates who can help us accelerate user growth. Similar experience in a successful tech startup (preferably in the art vertical) is highly desirable. In return we can offer generous commission, equity, salary and a good work life balance
